Package org.jamwiki

The org.jamwiki package contains the core interfaces and classes needed for JAMWiki to function.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JAMWikiParser
    Interface to be used when implementing new parsers.
    SearchEngine
    This interface provides all methods needed for interacting with a search engine.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Environment
    The Environment class is instantiated as a singleton to provides access to JAMWiki property values stored in the jamwiki.properties file.
    WikiBase
    WikiBase is loaded as a singleton class and provides access to all core wiki structures.
    WikiConfiguration
    The WikiConfiguration class provides the infrastructure for retrieving configuration values.
    WikiMessage
    This class is a utility class useful for storing messages key and object values that can later be displayed using the jstl fmt:message tag.
    WikiVersion
    Utility class that holds the current Wiki version constant and provides methods for comparing Wiki versions.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WikiBase.UPLOAD_STORAGE
    Enum indicating where uploaded files are stored.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DataAccessException
    Custom exception class for JAMWiki data errors.
    WikiException
    Custom exception class for JAMWiki errors.

Package org.jamwiki Description

The org.jamwiki package contains the core interfaces and classes needed for JAMWiki to function. In particular, the WikiBase class is a singleton class that is instantiated at wiki startup to hold core data structures used in interacting with the database and performing searches.
